After reading the reviews on these booties, I decided to go with a size 9. I typically wear a 9.5-10, depending on the shoe. I was pleasantly surprised that not only did these fit - but I actually have enough room in them for my slightly wider feet, AND they are super comfortable right out of the box. I have room enough to fit inserts in, too, as I work in retail and am on my feet for hours on end. The zippers in the back make putting them on and taking them off a breeze, too.  As for the style, I get nonstop compliments on these every time I wear them! They elevate any look. Definitely a good buy. Give these cuties a try, you won’t regret it. Good value for the price!
